entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0197.10634] us-gaap:TemporaryEquityAccretionToRedemptionValueAdjustment has a value of 108,000 and has been used with an inappropriate member on the StatementEquityComponentsAxis. This fact value has been used with the StatementEquityComponentsAxis. This element should not be used to represent movements in equity. Please remove the member from this fact or consider using a different element to represent the movement of Equity.
The properties of this us-gaap:TemporaryEquityAccretionToRedemptionValueAdjustment fact are: Period :2024-01-01 to 2024-12-31 Dimensions : us-gaap:StatementEquityComponentsAxis=us-gaap:RetainedEarningsMember Unit : USD Rule Element Id:10634 Rule version: 26.0.9 - wlfc-20241231.htm 8

property.name: label
property.value: Temporary Equity, Accretion to Redemption Value, Adjustment
